name: Cauldronborn
description: The Cauldronborn is a small construct that can consume potions, enhancing its health while fighting.
memorable: Its ability to consume potions for health and to draw in nearby potions offers a tactical advantage in combat.
goals: To consume potions and pursue magical items.
relations: It may be found in areas rich with potions or near spellcasters.
environment: Often encountered in magical laboratories or potion shops.
strengths: Can heal itself by consuming potions and has regenerative abilities.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity and Charisma scores make it ineffective in social situations and agile attacks.
attacks: Can make two slam attacks dealing bludgeoning damage, displaying physical strength in combat.
most_powerful_ability: Call Potion allows it to magically draw potions towards itself, potentially overwhelming foes.
senses: It has darkvision and a passive perception score of 8, allowing it to notice threats poorly.
additional_information: Immune to poison damage and several conditions like charmed and frightened.
Resistant to piercing and slashing from nonmagical attacks.
Has low Intelligence, affecting its cognitive capabilities.
Gains hit points from consumed potions, enhancing its survival.
Can sense potions up to a mile away, giving it a strategic scouting ability.

creature that detects potions and heals
construct with regeneration and potion abilities
small creature immune to poison and frightened
